document_data.name: Hlin Trollbane
document_data.mainbody: '''Hlin Trollbane''' was a retired [[bounty hunter]] that lived in the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Despite being quite old and frail during her retired years, Hlin still had a discerning eye and keen instincts.
document_data.Personality: Hlin maintained a strong moral code throughout her life.
document_data.Possessions: She carried with her a trusted [[battleaxe]] as well as a [[handaxe]].
document_data.Relationships: During her years as a bounty hunter, Hlin made many enemies throughout the [[Sword Coast]] and decided to return to the isolated lands of Icewind Dale.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a serial killer carried out a series of murders in various settlements of the Ten Towns. Hlin took it upon herself to investigate the killings, linking them with a trading company called [[Torg's]]. She placed a 100 [[gp]] bounty on the head of [[Sephek Kaltro]], a follower of [[Auril]] whom she believed was responsible, and hired on a group of adventurers to help track him down.
